item.title: List of Dynamics GP 10 Versions
item.description:
Update: You can find my post about the GP 2010 version list here: http://dynamicsgpland.blogspot.com/2011/02/dynamics-gp-2010-version-list-heaven.html. Have you ever encountered difficulties determining the specific service pack or hotfix applied at a client’s location? Or perhaps struggled with a machine due to GP version conflicts? Have you ever attempted to set up a test environment using copies of client databases only to be met with frustrating errors such as: “You are attempting to configure an older version of product 2992...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/list-of-dynamics-gp-10-versions/
